name: Count lowercase and uppercase vowels
instruction:
The function `countLetters` takes the string

The string can consist of letters of the Latin alphabet in different registers and symbols.

The function must return an object with the following properties:
* `vowelLowerCase` - number of lowercase vowel letters
* `vowelUpperCase` - number of vowel letters in upper case
* `others` - number of remaining characters and/or consonants

An example of how to start this function:
```javascript
countLetters('aAbcde') // { vowelLowerCase: 2, vowelUpperCase: 1, others: 3 }
countLetters('HI there! 123') // { vowelLowerCase: 2, vowelUpperCase: 1, others: 10 }
```
